segments.text: Will you book a ticket to New York for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir.When do you want to leave here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will , that'll be the sixth of September .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right.Will you check what fights are available on the sixth of September ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll check it over.Oh , there're three flights available that day.one at 2 p . m . , one at 5 p . m . and the other at 9p . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll have the 5 o'clock one.What time do I check in ?
segments.speaker: S1
